name: Painta and the Slime Mix Up (AngelHam)
name_original: Painta and the Slime Mix Up (AngelHam)
description:
Oh no! The paint slimes have invaded your home and are stealing all the color! Time to pull out the big guns and mix things up!

Paint slimes are devious creatures known to steal color. Good thing Painta has her paint bazooka to fend them off! Play as Painta and defeat the slimes.

Made in the Chillenium 2022 Game Jam at start of April

Updated Through June and July

Controls:

WASD to move

1-2-3 to swap colors OR Scroll 

Left Mouse Button to fire

Right Click to self-paint

Credits:

Developers: Angel Ham and Ryan Mendoza

Artists: Madeleine Cadungog and Amelia McCarthy

Music: Amelia McCarthy

SFX: Freesound.com

Font:  Alkemichal + Small Pixel 7 by Sizenko Alexander
